activities: Syntactx, LLC, headquartered in United States is a contract research organization that provides outsourced services to the medical device, pharmaceutical and diagnostics industries including clinical trial operations, core laboratory, medical writing, technology solutions and regulatory consulting. In the performance of services, Syntactx may receive data from individuals participating in research studies including research participants, healthcare providers or other consultants. Syntactx may also process human resources data from prospective, past or current employees.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, Client, Customer, Clinical trial data (online, offline, manually processed)
privacyprograms: Self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs), Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
